name: Dark Scorpion - Meanae the Thorn
desc:
When this card inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent, you can activate 1 of these effects:
● Add 1 "Dark Scorpion" card from your Deck to your hand.
● Target 1 "Dark Scorpion" card in your Graveyard; add that target to your hand.
str2: Add 1 card that includes "Dark Scorpion" in its card name, or is named "Cliff the Trap Remover", from your Deck to your hand.
str3: Add 1 card that includes "Dark Scorpion" in its card name, or is named "Cliff the Trap Remover", from your Graveyard to your hand.
